snippet: The competing business dealings of former high-ranking United States officials in Kosovo may present a special ethical quandary.
abstract: Competing business dealings of former high ranking United States officials in Kosovo may present a special ethical quandary; foreign policy experts say practice of former officials, like Madeleine K Albright, returning to do business in Kosovo is not uncommon but holds the possibility of conflicts of interest in a country with an outsize American influence.
lead_paragraph: The competing business dealings of former high-ranking United States officials in Kosovo may present a special ethical quandary.

headline.seo: Americans Who Helped Free Kosovo Return as Entrepreneurs
headline.main: That Crush at Kosovo’s Business Door? The Return of U.S. Heroes
headline.print_headline: That Crush at Kosovo’s Business Door? The Return of U.S. Heroes
